tool_description: Extracts and structures key characteristics of funding organizations including their mission, priorities, funding history, and organizational preferences from funder websites and documents.

funder_name.description: Name of the funding organization to analyze

funder_website_url.description: Primary website URL of the funding organization

additional_sources.description: Additional URLs or document sources about the funder

error_messages: Invalid URL format: Provide valid HTTP/HTTPS URLs for funder_website_url and additional_sources.
Funder not found: The specified funder name and website combination could not be verified.
Insufficient data: Unable to extract meaningful profile information from provided sources.
usage: Provide the funder_name and funder_website_url, optionally include additional_sources. The tool will extract structured information about the funder's characteristics and preferences.

funder_name.description: Confirmed name of the funding organization

funding_priorities.description: List of key funding priority areas

typical_grant_size.description: Typical range of grant amounts awarded

geographic_focus.description: Geographic regions or locations of focus
